ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.ime
Class ServiceTest

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.ime.ServiceTest

public class ServiceTest
extends Activity

Activity we used to test the proper operation of our DetectionService. Will not be needed for a possible deployment but we kept it as an entry point to our Application during development. Based on the Remote Service Controller and Remote Service Binding code samples from the API Demos example included in the Android SDK (under App/Service).
